sect1.title: HTTP Server Management
sect1.para: This page allows to create new or manage existing virtual hosts and directories.
Click on button in presented list of virtual hosts to open the list of associated virtual directories.
When virtual host is selected denoted by , a new directory can be added via "Add new directory" link or existing to be managed via links under "Actions" column.
Use Start|Stop buttons to start and stop a listener. (The default ones can not be managed)
Use the form at the bottom to define a new virtual host.

simplelist.member: HTTP Host is the value of "Host:" in incoming HTTP request headers to match to.
Default listener cannot be stopped or deleted. Please refer to Virtuoso ini file.
